post:
I hear you guys like servers in Amsterdam, so I bring you Amster DAMN! 

* 2 CPU Core (Equal Share) - Intel(R) Xeon(R) E-2278G CPU (5 GHz max)
* 4 GB Ram (DDR4 because its 2021 amirite?)
* 50 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space 
* 12 TB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit shared (burst 10 gbit)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
* FREE complimentary DDOS protection
* FREE Direct Admin Licnese on request.

This coupon is only valid for 20 uses in total, you will get a 40% discount on monthly, quarterly, 6 month,s or 1-year payments.

Order Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=217

Coupon code: B8LTX0EU4M

**Monthly Price: €6**

BONUS: If you pay for 1 year upfront you will qualify for an extra 25GB of disk space - please request this via ticket before you do your initial install and within 48 hours of purchase.


Pssssst... it might work on other plans with more memory.


Yabs for the cool kids.

If you want nested KVM we have nodes available with that too!

Any custom quotes wanted in Amsterdam or London please feel free to ask.

No storage plans available sorry :D but soon.

This is not exclusive, feel free to share far and wide.

inb4 @ehab finds a problem with the offer.
